---

# get
操作概述: 查看hosts文件内容

命令参数:
```bash
无
```

使用示例:
```bash
acli system hosts get
```

结果示例:
```bash
###!!! Attention: DO NOT edit this file !!!###
###!!! your action will be overwritten by sfipns, which will write this file by FLAG !!!###
###!!! you should edit this file by command: /sf/bin/sfipns !!!###
127.0.0.1       localhost.local localhost
10.131.139.51   host-005056893b01
# The following lines are desirable for IPv6 capable hosts
#FLAG:1
::1     ip6-localhost ip6-loopback
fe00::0 ip6-localnet
ff00::0 ip6-mcastprefix
ff02::1 ip6-allnodes
ff02::2 ip6-allrouters
# VS storage network
#FLAG:2
# Host ip network
9.139.51.100    localhost
9.139.51.101    host-0050568949a9
10.131.133.111  host-fefcfe1845a5 arbiter-host-fefcfe1845a5
#FLAG:3
10.131.139.51   host-mgr-005056893b01 acloud.zk3 acloud.zk1 mysql-master anet-controller1 anet-controller3 anet-master anet-controller2
10.131.139.53   host-mgr-0050568949a9 acloud.zk2
10.131.133.111  host-mgr-fefcfe1845a5 arbiter-host-mgr-fefcfe1845a5
#FLAG:4
10.131.139.51   svc-master
10.131.139.53   update-frame-master
```
